patterns: Is there any futsal club in MHT school?
How many times a week the futsal club train?
Who is the futsal team coach?
Where are the training usually held?
intents.responses: There is a football club in MHT. They train futsal and football once a week. They use football field during football training and use futsal court during futsal training. Also we have a coach named Coach Agung who trains us.
